XenotypeDef.label: jujutsu sorcerer
XenotypeDef.description: Jujutsu sorcerers are individuals with the innate ability to control and manipulate Cursed Energy. They possess heightened spiritual awareness and physical capabilities, allowing them to combat Cursed Spirits and other supernatural threats. Their unique abilities set them apart from ordinary humans.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Jujutsu sorcerers are individuals capable of manipulating Cursed Energy to combat supernatural threats. They possess enhanced physical and spiritual abilities, making them formidable fighters against Cursed Spirits and other mystical dangers.
